lines.text: Well - heh, heh, heh - May the best man - heh - win.
Thanks, I will. but I won't beat ya too bad. Shake.
[Toby goes to shake Max's hand, but he pulls it away]
Heh-heh-heh-heh. That's a funny joke, but - heh-heh - you caught me fair and square.
[Again Max pulls away his hand just as Toby stretches out his]
Don't you think you'd better go? The tortoise has the lead.
Say, I've lots of time to play. My middle name is speed.
He sure can run like sixty. Oh, baby, ain't he slick?
I was just a-warmin' up. Here's a better trick.
